law.catch_line: Capital and surplus requirements for an insurer shall be based on all the kinds of insurance busines...

text.section: Capital and surplus requirements for an insurer shall be based on all the kinds of insurance business that the insurer transacts or will transact, regardless of where the insurance business is transacted.

section.section: In addition to any other capital and surplus requirements of this article, each insurer's assets and surplus as regards policyholders shall be reasonable in relation to the insurer's outstanding liabilities and adequate to its financial needs.

text.section: The provisions of this subtitle shall be supplemented by the requirements of Subtitle 3 of this title.
